name: Dyer blob
description:
You work for a grumpy merchant, and you have to dye and sell cloths to peoples. For this, you just have to eat a piece of cloth and some flower to obtain the right color.

Controls :

KeyboardGamepad
Arrow - Move
Space - Drop object on the ground or buy

Left stick or D-Pad - Move
A - Drop object on the ground or buy

Made with Construct 2.

Dev :
Rei Dunamis
Graphism :
Rei Dunamis
Elfée Lunathique
Music and sounds :
Myrrhe
